trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or other server or user) controls.
trans-unit.target: Funge da classe base per tutti i controlli zona che fungono da contenitori per <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> (o server o altri utenti) i controlli.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part, una zona è un controllo composito, rappresentato come una tabella HTML, che contiene altri controlli in un'area definita di una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is a zone that inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneBase è un'area che erediterà dalla base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>classe e fornisce un set di comportamenti di base per le zone derivate che contengono <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, i controlli server e i controlli utente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The combination of WebPartZoneBase zones with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time.
trans-unit.target: La combinazione di WebPartZoneBase zone con <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(e altri server) controlli Form l'interfaccia utente principale di un'applicazione Web part, la visualizzazione di una pagina che gli utenti interagiscono con la maggior parte dei casi normale.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain.
trans-unit.target: Tutte le zone forniscono un set comune di elementi dell'interfaccia utente per i controlli che contengono.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione dettagliata degli elementi dell'interfaccia utente comune a tutte le zone, vedere Cenni preliminari sulla classe per <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on.
trans-unit.target: La zona WebPartZoneBase include una sezione del corpo che contiene i controlli server e un oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto utilizzato per il rendering dei controlli contenuti e i relativi elementi di colore, ad esempio verbi, bordi e così via.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the features inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, the WebPartZoneBase class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features.
trans-unit.target: Oltre alle funzionalità di ereditare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>(classe), la classe WebPartZoneBase aggiunge trascinando il controllo lato client, verbi specifici (per abilitare azioni dell'interfaccia utente comune, ad esempio la riduzione a icona, chiusura, eliminazione e i controlli di modifica) e funzionalità aggiuntive di stile.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneBase è anche la classe di ereditare da se si desidera progettare un fuso orario personalizzato è basato su database.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from WebPartZoneBase, and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are data-bound and display weather information.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile creare un meteorologiche zona Web part che eredita da WebPartZoneBase ed è progettato per contenere e fornire le funzionalità di layout e altri servizi per <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i controlli che sono associati a dati e visualizzano informazioni meteorologiche.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneBase contiene un numero di proprietà per l'utilizzo di attributi di stile in una zona.

trans-unit.source: There are several properties for borders, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diverse proprietà per i bordi, tra cui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>, and others.
trans-unit.target: È disponibile un gruppo di proprietà per l'utilizzo di attributi di stile di menu che possono essere visualizzati nell'intestazione di una zona, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>e altri utenti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneBase contiene anche un numero di membri per la gestione dei verbi in una zona.

trans-unit.source: These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Questi membri riguardano i verbi visualizzati nei controlli Web part della zona.

trans-unit.source: While zone-level verbs can be added to WebPartZoneBase zones, by default they do not have any.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene sia possono aggiungere verbi a livello di zona per le zone WebPartZoneBase, per impostazione predefinita non sono.

trans-unit.source: There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well.
trans-unit.target: È presente un set di verbi standard forniti con i controlli Web part per l'utilizzo con i controlli Web part e gli sviluppatori possono aggiungere verbi personalizzati.

trans-unit.source: Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Alcune proprietà importanti per l'utilizzo di verbi includono proprietà che fanno riferimento ad alcuni degli oggetti verbo standard, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: I verbi standard vengono visualizzati nel menu dei verbi (in genere visualizzato nell'interfaccia utente come menu a discesa) nella barra del titolo di ogni controllo contenuto in una zona.

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre disponibile un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>proprietà che consente di determinare il tipo di oggetto selezionabile rappresenta un verbo nell'interfaccia utente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other key members for working with verbs include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event.
trans-unit.target: Includono altri membri chiave per l'utilizzo dei verbi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>metodo, che è un gestore eventi che può essere sostituito per la gestione personalizzata del processo di creazione del verbo, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of members for working with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneBase contiene un numero di membri per l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli contenuti in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>proprietà fa riferimento alla raccolta di tutti <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(e altri server) nell'area dei controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Diversi metodi corrispondono ai verbi standard e alle operazioni che un utente può eseguire sui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in una zona, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of members in the WebPartZoneBase class that concern how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are laid out or arranged within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Sono inoltre un numero di membri di WebPartZoneBase classe tale problema come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i controlli vengono disposti o disposte nella zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>proprietà determina se i controlli possono essere spostati tra zone o riorganizzati all'interno di una zona per gli utenti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>proprietà consente di determinare se i controlli in una zona sono disposte orizzontalmente o verticalmente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer might render the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer potrebbe rendere l'altezza di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>o controlli contenuti in modo imprevisto, a seconda dell'orientamento della zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la documentazione per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other methods in the WebPartZoneBase class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Altri metodi nella classe WebPartZoneBase offrono un controllo a livello di codice dettagliato sul rendering delle varie aree di una zona.

trans-unit.source: Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Molti di questi metodi l'override dei metodi di base ereditati dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>(classe), per personalizzare il rendering per le zone che contengono <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: Important methods include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Importanti includono metodi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza la classe per l'uso da un'istanza di classe ereditata.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore può essere chiamato solo da una classe ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the layout of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be changed within a zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il layout di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli possono essere modificati all'interno di una zona.

trans-unit.source: The AllowLayoutChange property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà AllowLayoutChange ha effetto solo quando una zona è una modalità di visualizzazione in cui il layout dei controlli nell'area può essere modificato, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When AllowLayoutChange is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando AllowLayoutChange è impostata su `false` in una determinata zona, esistono una serie di azioni che gli utenti finali è impediti l'esecuzione nei controlli di zona:-gli utenti non è possibile trascinare i controlli in un'area diversa, riordinare i controlli all'interno della zona o spostare i controlli nell'area di.

trans-unit.source: - A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls..
trans-unit.target: -Un numero di proprietà che interessano l'interfaccia utente (UI) di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli della zona sono disabilitati in modo che gli utenti non è possibile modificare tali proprietà, mentre il controllo viene modificato utilizzando <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controlli...</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: -Gli utenti non è possibile aggiungere nuovi controlli per la zona da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: - The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: -La chiusura, eliminare, ridurre al minimo e ripristinare i verbi non vengono visualizzati sui controlli di zona.

trans-unit.source: Although the AllowLayoutChange property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà AllowLayoutChange influisce sulla possibilità degli utenti finali di modificare il layout di una zona tramite l'interfaccia utente, non influisce sulla possibilità di modificare il layout a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: For example, if AllowLayoutChange is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close controls programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se AllowLayoutChange è impostato su `false`, gli utenti non possono chiudere controlli della zona, ma uno sviluppatore potrebbe ancora chiamare la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>metodo per chiudere consente di controllare a livello di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non può essere impostata da temi o temi di fogli di stile.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [ASP.NET temi e interfacce](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the layout can be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il layout può essere modificato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color for the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore del bordo di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set a default color for zone borders.
trans-unit.target: La base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>viene eseguito l'override di proprietà per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe per impostare un colore predefinito per i bordi di zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderColor property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare la proprietà BorderColor per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controllare in modo dichiarativo o a livello di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Il bordo viene visualizzato solo quando si trova in una modalità di visualizzazione in cui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>le funzionalità dell'interfaccia utente di classe sono visibili, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the border color.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> che contiene il colore del bordo.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>.
trans-unit.target: Il colore predefinito è <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Gray*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of border that surrounds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo di bordo che circonda un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set the default border style for zones.
trans-unit.target: La base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>viene eseguito l'override di proprietà per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe per impostare lo stile del bordo predefinito per le zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderStyle property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare la proprietà BorderStyle per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controllare in modo dichiarativo o a livello di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Il bordo viene visualizzato solo quando si trova in una modalità di visualizzazione in cui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>le funzionalità dell'interfaccia utente di classe sono visibili, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> object that contains the kind of border.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref> oggetto che contiene il tipo di bordo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border that surrounds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo spessore del bordo che circonda un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set the default border width for zones.
trans-unit.target: La base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>viene eseguito l'override di proprietà per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe per impostare la larghezza del bordo predefinita per le zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderWidth property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare la proprietà BorderWidth per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controllare in modo dichiarativo o a livello di codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Il bordo viene visualizzato solo quando si trova in una modalità di visualizzazione in cui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>le funzionalità dell'interfaccia utente di classe sono visibili, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The width in the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> of the border that surrounds a zone.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> del bordo che circonda una zona.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to close the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetto che consente agli utenti di chiudere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The close verb referenced by the CloseVerb property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Il verbo di chiusura fa riferimento la proprietà CloseVerb viene visualizzato nel menu dei verbi di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, a user can switch the page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Chiusura di un controllo ne preclude l'interazione di una pagina, anche se gli sviluppatori di fornire l'interfaccia utente (UI), ad esempio un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>area che contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>(controllo), un utente può impostare la pagina <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>e aggiungere un'istanza precedentemente chiusa di un controllo alla pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to close <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> che consente agli utenti di chiudere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Closes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Chiude un selezionato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The typical way for an end user to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: Il modo comune per un utente finale chiudere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo è facendo clic sul verbo di chiusura nella barra del titolo del controllo</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The CloseWebPart method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which carries out the action of closing the control.
trans-unit.target: Le chiamate al metodo CloseWebPart il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>(classe), che esegue l'azione di chiusura del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo deve essere utilizzato solo per le <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> derivate

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto chiuso <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo non è stato eseguito il rendering in una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, viene aggiunto al catalogo della pagina, che mantiene un elenco di tutti i controlli chiusi in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` element declared with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: Se una pagina Web part in cui un utente chiude un controllo ha anche un `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` elemento dichiarato con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, quindi l'utente può passare la pagina in modalità di visualizzazione catalogo e aggiungere il controllo chiuso nuovamente alla pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a user to be able to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property on the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property on the zone must both be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per un utente sia in grado di chiudere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(controllo), il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>proprietà del controllo e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>impostare proprietà della zona `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be closed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo per essere chiuso.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to create connections between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetto che consente agli utenti finali di creare connessioni tra <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that creates a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> che crea una connessione tra due <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of creating a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Avvia il processo di creazione di una connessione tra due <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectWebPart method can be called only when the page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ConnectWebPart può essere chiamato solo quando la pagina è connessione in modalità di visualizzazione (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The method in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method, which completes the several steps necessary to fully connect two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo chiama a sua volta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>(metodo), che completa i diversi passaggi necessari per connettere due <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo deve essere utilizzato solo per le <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> derivate

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that initiates the connection with another selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo che avvia la connessione con un altro selezionato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Crea il set di figlio di controlli contenuti in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateChildControls esegue l'override della base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per creare il set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli contenuti in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Ciò si verifica quando la pagina Web part è in modalità progettazione, perché il layout dei controlli nella pagina (e all'interno di zone) può essere modificato in modalità progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Il set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli all'interno di una zona devono essere creati per supportare le possibili modifiche all'ordine o occorrenza dei controlli nella zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that contains all the controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto che contiene tutti i controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains references to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> che contiene riferimenti al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of style characteristics that apply to a zone control when it is visible.
trans-unit.target: Crea un set di caratteristiche di stile che si applicano a un controllo zona quando è visibile.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method creates a set of standard style attributes that apply to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateControlStyle crea un set standard di attributi di stile che si applicano a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes apply only when a page is in a display mode in which a zone itself is visible, such as catalog, edit, or design display mode.
trans-unit.target: Gli attributi di stile si applicano solo quando una pagina è una modalità di visualizzazione in cui una zona è visibile, ad esempio catalogo, modifica o la modalità di visualizzazione progettazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> che contiene gli attributi di stile per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando vengono creati i verbi per una zona da cui deriva il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> child zone.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagina possono aggiungere un gestore all'evento e collegare altri verbi personalizzati per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona figlio.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The CreateVerbs event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> stage of page processing, or during postback events.
trans-unit.target: L'evento CreateVerbs viene generato quando vengono creati i verbi per una zona, ovvero durante la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>fase dell'elaborazione della pagina o durante gli eventi di postback.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object to change the appearance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Consente alle zone per sostituire un oggetto personalizzato derivate <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> oggetto per modificare l'aspetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Colore di Web part fa riferimento agli elementi di interfaccia utente dell'utente delle periferiche che circondano ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Il colore di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo include un bordo, la barra del titolo e le icone, testo del titolo e menu dei verbi visualizzati all'interno della barra del titolo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: L'aspetto del riquadro è impostato a livello di zona e si applica a tutti <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object affects the entire rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not merely their chrome elements.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto influisce su tutto il rendering del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, non solo gli elementi di chrome.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: To use the CreateWebPartChrome method, you must create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare il metodo CreateWebPartChrome, è necessario creare un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto per definire l'aspetto del colore per i controlli Web part in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and overrides the CreateWebPartChrome method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre necessario creare un'area personalizzata che eredita la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe ed esegue l'override del metodo CreateWebPartChrome per consentire la sostituzione dell'oggetto colore personalizzato e applicarlo ai controlli della zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> that determines how <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone are rendered.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> che determina come <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> rendering dei controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to delete the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetto che consente agli utenti di eliminare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The delete verb referenced by the DeleteVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Il verbo delete fa riferimento la proprietà DeleteVerb dichiarativo viene visualizzato nella casella a discesa dei verbi nella barra del titolo di ogni dinamico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page).
trans-unit.target: Il verbo di eliminazione non è disponibile in controlli statici (dichiarati nel markup della pagina Web).

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: Il verbo viene visualizzato nel menu dei verbi solo quando la pagina è una modalità di visualizzazione che consente di modificare il layout di pagina, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page.
trans-unit.target: Eliminazione di un controllo in modo permanente rimuove l'istanza del controllo da una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un controllo chiuso, un'istanza di un controllo eliminata non può mai essere nuovamente aggiunto a una pagina.

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, the deleted control instance is not available in it.
trans-unit.target: Quando un utente elimina un controllo e quindi attiva una pagina in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>la zona contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>controllo, l'istanza del controllo eliminato non è disponibile in tale</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può aggiungere una nuova istanza di un controllo, se il controllo è disponibile nel catalogo, ma l'istanza eliminata è stata rimossa in modo permanente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to delete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> che consente agli utenti di eliminare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Elimina un selezionato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo in una zona.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and if `webPart` is static, an exception is thrown because static controls (controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page) cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) e se `webPart` è statico, viene generata un'eccezione in quanto i controlli statici (dichiarati nel markup della pagina Web) non possono essere eliminati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo deve essere utilizzato solo per le <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> derivate

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo da eliminare.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the text being used as the title for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone when the zone itself is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore corrente del testo utilizzato come il titolo per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona quando la zona stesso è visibile.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property either gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> property or, if that value is `null`, uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value for the zone.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DisplayTitle Ottiene il relativo valore dalla base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>proprietà o, se tale valore è `null`, utilizza il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>valore per la zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title text for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo del titolo per una zona.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è il valore della base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> possibile trascinare i controlli interno o all'esterno di una zona.

trans-unit.source: The DragDropEnabled property indicates whether <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone at run time.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DragDropEnabled indica se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli possono essere trascinati interno o all'esterno di una zona in fase di esecuzione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The property is used specifically for checking whether the page is in a page display mode that allows drag-and-drop editing, and whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà viene utilizzata in particolare per controllare se la pagina è in una modalità di visualizzazione che consente la modifica di trascinamento e rilascio e se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se è possano trascinare i controlli.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color around the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone and its drop-cue regions when a user is dragging a control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore del bordo di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona e delle relative aree di rilascio quando un utente sta trascinando un controllo.

trans-unit.source: When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the DragHighlightColor property affects the border color.
trans-unit.target: Quando un controllo trascinato viene posizionato su una zona in cui può essere rilasciato, vengono visualizzate le aree di rilascio, che mostra l'area in cui è possibile rilasciare il controllo e di queste aree, nonché la zona, che la proprietà di DragHighlightColor determina il colore del bordo.

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DragHighlightColor consente di impostare il colore visualizzato quando si trascina un controllo nella zona.

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DragHighlightColor ha effetto solo quando una pagina Web è in modalità di visualizzazione che consente il layout di una zona da modificare, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the highlight color.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> che contiene il colore di evidenziazione.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.
trans-unit.target: Il colore predefinito è <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetto che consente agli utenti di modificare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The edit verb referenced by the EditVerb property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control enables an end user to switch a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il verbo di modifica a cui fa riferimento la proprietà EditVerb su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controllo consente agli utenti finali passare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo della zona in modalità di modifica, in cui è possibile personalizzare l'aspetto, proprietà, layout e il contenuto del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Lo stesso verbo di modifica viene utilizzato per tutti i controlli in una zona.

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando una pagina Web part entra in modalità di modifica (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), il verbo di modifica diventa visibile nel menu dei verbi di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>contenuto nell'area del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> che consente agli utenti di modificare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of editing a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Avvia il processo di modifica di un determinato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo deve essere utilizzato solo per le <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> derivate

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be edited.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo da modificare.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control contains no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un messaggio che viene visualizzato quando un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> non contiene alcun controllo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The EmptyZoneText property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: La proprietà EmptyZoneText esegue l'override della proprietà di base per distinguere tra i casi in cui la proprietà non è stata impostata e quelli in cui è stata impostata su una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà non è stata impostata e la zona non contiene controlli, quando una pagina Web part entra in una modalità di visualizzazione in cui la zona è visibile, un messaggio di testo specifico delle impostazioni cultura predefinito viene visualizzato in un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If the EmptyZoneText property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore della proprietà EmptyZoneText intenzionalmente è stato impostato su una stringa vuota, nessun messaggio di testo viene visualizzato in un'area vuota.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il messaggio visualizzato in un'area vuota.

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa di specifiche delle impostazioni cultura predefinita viene fornita da .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to export an XML definition file for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetto che consente agli utenti di esportare un file di definizione XML per ogni <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo in una zona.

trans-unit.source: The export verb referenced by the ExportVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu within the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Il verbo di esportazione a cui fa riferimento la proprietà ExportVerb viene visualizzato nella casella a discesa dei verbi nella barra del titolo di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: Il verbo viene visualizzato nel menu dei verbi in tutte le modalità di visualizzazione di pagina.

trans-unit.source: To enable users to export a definition file for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property on a control to something other than its default value, which is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: Per consentire agli utenti di esportare un file di definizione per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo, è necessario impostare anche la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>proprietà su un controllo a un valore diverso da quello predefinito, ovvero <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to export a definition file for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> che consente agli utenti di esportare un file di definizione per <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual or effective current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, given the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*> property of the zone and the current display mode of the Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'attuale effettivo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valore di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo, dato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>proprietà della zona e la modalità di visualizzazione corrente della pagina Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control for which the zone needs to retrieve the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> setting.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"> </xref> controllo per il quale la zona deve recuperare l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>impostazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value that contains the kind of border that currently frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valore contenente il tipo di bordo che attualmente delimita i controlli Web part contenuti in una zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets an initial collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls contained in a zone, based on a template or some storage medium.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un insieme iniziale di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli contenuti in una zona, basato su un modello o un supporto di archiviazione.

trans-unit.source: The GetInitialWebParts method gets the initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetInitialWebParts Ottiene la raccolta iniziale di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli per una zona solo se è disponibile un modello o un'altra forma di archiviazione che determinano quali sono i controlli nella zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo non riflette le modifiche di personalizzazione, che potrebbero indicare che i controlli nella raccolta iniziale effettivamente sono stati spostati da un utente in un'altra zona.

trans-unit.source: The initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta iniziale di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli della zona non sono necessariamente lo stesso della raccolta contenuto nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>proprietà della zona, che riflette l'insieme di controlli della zona corrente quando viene eseguito il rendering di una pagina, tenendo conto delle modifiche di personalizzazione che sono state apportate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> that contains the initial set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls that belong in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> che contiene il set iniziale di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> i controlli che fanno parte di una zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se una zona è presente un'area di piè di pagina.

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà HasFooter esegue l'override della base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per impostare il valore predefinito su `false` per <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la zona è presente un'area di piè di pagina; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se una zona è un'area di intestazione.

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls when the page display mode is in normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà HasHeader esegue l'override della base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per impostare il valore predefinito su `false` per i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>controlli quando la modalità di visualizzazione della pagina è in modalità normale <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page is in one of the display modes that allow page design, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, then the value of the HasHeader property is `true`, so that the specified zone can display header user interface (UI) elements.
trans-unit.target: Se una pagina Web part si trova in una delle modalità di visualizzazione che consentono di progettazione della pagina, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, il valore della proprietà HasHeader è `true`, in modo che la zona specificata la visualizzazione degli elementi dell'interfaccia utente dell'intestazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a header area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la zona è presente un'area di intestazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when the page is in normal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> quando la pagina è in modalità normale <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"> </xref>.
